sentence: The other shoe has dropped for Rep. David Schweikert (R-AZ).
author: Roger Sollenberger
title: GOP Congressman Fined $125,000 For Financial Violations

sentence: Arizona Republic Rep. David Schweikert’s campaign committee agreed to pay a $125,000 fine to theFederal Election Commission for misusing donations and failing to adequately report other transactions, according to disclosures filed Friday by the FEC.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Rep. David Schweikert's campaign to pay $125,000 fine for 'knowing and willful' reporting violations

sentence: I make a mean vanilla cappuccino.” David Schweikert is about to pour his seventh — wait, no, maybe it’s the eighth?
author: Jim Saksa
title: ‘We all sound like it’s the 1990s,’ says Rep. David Schweikert
